message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a price that I think is fair. I'm starting at $14000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $12500. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11800 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money. I'm counteroffering at $13000. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $12200 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to meet you at $12800. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $12800, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $12400 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to feel like we're really close to a deal, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a good price. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $12900. Is this a price you'd be willing to pay?
